queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.privileged is true

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/lib/modules' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/lib/modules' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run/docker.sock' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run/docker.sock' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/boot' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/boot' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/proc' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/proc' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.volumeMounts.name={{dshm}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.volumeMounts.name={{dshm}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.volumeMounts.name={{config-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.volumeMounts.name={{config-volume}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/lib/modules' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/lib/modules' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/usr' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/usr' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/boot' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/boot' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/docker.sock' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/docker.sock' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/proc' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-falco' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/proc' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.query_name: Docker Daemon Socket is Exposed to Containers
queries.description: Sees if Docker Daemon Socket is not exposed to Containers

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.volumes.name={{docker-socket}}.hostPath.path should not be '/var/run/docker.sock'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.volumes.name={{docker-socket}}.hostPath.path is '/var/run/docker.sock'

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{falco}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{falco}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.apiVersion of ClusterRole should be {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.apiVersion of ClusterRole  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.apiVersion of DaemonSet should be {{apps/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.apiVersion of DaemonSet  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.apiVersion of ClusterRoleBinding should be {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.apiVersion of ClusterRoleBinding  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-falco}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{falco}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined
